columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint group.

columns.name: listener_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of parent listener.

columns.name: endpoint_group_region
columns.description: The AWS Region where the endpoint group is located.

columns.name: health_check_interval_seconds
columns.description: The time—10 seconds or 30 seconds—between health checks for each endpoint.

columns.name: health_check_path
columns.description: If the protocol is HTTP/S, then this value provides the ping path that Global Accelerator uses for the destination on the endpoints for health checks.

columns.name: health_check_port
columns.description: The port that Global Accelerator uses to perform health checks on endpoints that are part of this endpoint group.

columns.name: health_check_protocol
columns.description: The protocol that Global Accelerator uses to perform health checks on endpoints that are part of this endpoint group.

columns.name: port_overrides
columns.description: Overrides for destination ports used to route traffic to an endpoint.

columns.name: threshold_count
columns.description: The number of consecutive health checks required to set the state of a healthy endpoint to unhealthy, or to set an unhealthy endpoint to healthy.

columns.name: traffic_dial_percentage
columns.description: The percentage of traffic to send to an AWS Region.
